response.overview: Majd is a writer and theatrical director decides to divorce his an actress wife, during the opening of their latest play they performed together, after which he decides to travel outside Syria, At that moment he hears about the death of his cousin, and a coffin containing his body is brought to his home, he is asked to transport the coffin to his family's village, where he had always lived avoiding it, and the return to it one day, evading the dangers of the journey fearing the idea of death, and being exposed to unexpected events and fluctuations that put him in direct confrontation with himself. —maha on imdb
response.title: رجل وثلاثة أيام
